full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 755 Filed 08/10/22 Page 66 of 262 1771 LC8Cmax3 Hesse - direct 1 A. Yes. If someone called, there was a message pad right by the phone and I would write it in that. 2 Q. Who gave you the instructions about what to do if someone called the house when Epstein and Maxwell were away? 3 A. Initially, when I met with Ghislaine the first time, she told me, if anyone calls to please write it in that book. 4 Q. What did the message book look like? 5 A. It was, like, blue and it had a spiral -- it was more like a notebook. It had the time and the date and there were, like, two copies, you know, on each -- 6 Q. Where was the message book kept? 7 A. In the kitchen near the phone, there was like a little counter-desk area. 8 MS. MOE: Your Honor, may I have just one moment? 9 THE COURT: You may. 10 MS. MOE: Your Honor, may I approach the witness with what's marked for identification as Government Exhibits 1, 2, and 3? 11 THE COURT: You may. 12 MS. MOE: Thank you. 13 BY MS. MOE: 14 Q. Mrs. Hesse, I've handed you what's been marked for identification as Government Exhibits 1, 2, and 3. Do you see those? 15 A. Yes, I do. 16 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00013344

1 A. Yes. If someone called, there was a message pad right by the phone and I would write it in that. 2 Q. Who gave you the instructions about what to do if someone called the house when Epstein and Maxwell were away? 3 A. Initially, when I met with Ghislaine the first time, she told me, if anyone calls to please write it in that book. 4 Q. What did the message book look like? 5 A. It was, like, blue and it had a spiral -- it was more like a notebook. It had the time and the date and there were, like, two copies, you know, on each -- 6 Q. Where was the message book kept? 7 A. In the kitchen near the phone, there was like a little counter-desk area. 8 MS. MOE: Your Honor, may I have just one moment? 9 THE COURT: You may. 10 MS.
